00104         enum DirtyBits
00105         {
00106             DIRTY_VIEWS      = Object::DIRTY_CUSTOM << 0,
00107             DIRTY_LAYOUT_BITS = DIRTY_VIEWS | DIRTY_OBJECT_BITS
00108         };
00109 
00111         virtual uint64_t getRedistributableBits() const
00112             { return DIRTY_LAYOUT_BITS; }
